00053 CompositeOFScalarMultiply::CompositeOFScalarMultiply(double alp, 
00054                                            ObjectiveFunction* Obj,
00055                                            bool delete_of)
00056   : deleteObjFunc(delete_of)
00057 {
00058   objFunc=Obj;
00059   mAlpha=alp;
00060 }
00061 
00062 //Michael:  need to clean up here
00063 CompositeOFScalarMultiply::~CompositeOFScalarMultiply(){
00064   if (deleteObjFunc)
00065     delete objFunc;
00066 }
00067 
00068 ObjectiveFunction* CompositeOFScalarMultiply::clone() const
00069   { return new CompositeOFScalarMultiply( mAlpha, objFunc->clone(), true ); }
00070   
00071 void CompositeOFScalarMultiply::clear()
00072 {
00073   objFunc->clear();
00074 }

00076 void CompositeOFScalarMultiply::initialize_queue( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00077                                                   const Settings* settings,
00078                                                   MsqError& err )
00079 {
00080   objFunc->initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( 
00084                                                        MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00085                                                        const Settings* settings,
00086                                                        PatchSet* user_set,
00087                                                        MsqError& err )
00088 {
00089   bool rval = objFunc->initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh_and_domain, settings, user_set, err );
00090   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00094                                           PatchData& pd,
00095                                           double& value_out,
00096                                           bool free,
00097                                           MsqError& err )
00098 {
00099   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate( type, pd, value_out, free, err );
00100   value_out *= mAlpha;
00101   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00105                                              PatchData& pd,
00106                                              double& value_out,
00107                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00108                                              MsqError& err )
00109 {
00110   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_gradient( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, err );
00111   value_out *= mAlpha;
00112   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = grad_out.begin(); i != grad_out.end(); ++i)
00113     *i *= mAlpha;
00114   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00118                                             PatchData& pd,
00119                                             double& value_out,
00120                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00121                                             std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diag_out,
00122                                             MsqError& err )
00123 {
00124   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, diag_out, err );
00125   value_out *= mAlpha;
00126   for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00127     grad_out[i] *= mAlpha;
00128     diag_out[i] *= mAlpha;
00129   }
00130   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00131 }
00132 
00133 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00134                                             PatchData& pd,
00135                                             double& value_out,
00136                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00137                                             MsqHessian& Hessian_out,
00138                                             MsqError& err )
00139 {
00140   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_Hessian( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, Hessian_out, err );
00141   value_out *= mAlpha;
00142   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = grad_out.begin(); i != grad_out.end(); ++i)
00143     *i *= mAlpha;
00144   Hessian_out.scale( mAlpha );
00145   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00146 }
00147 
00148 int CompositeOFScalarMultiply::min_patch_layers() const
00149   { return objFunc->min_patch_layers(); }
